scalade 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

affix()

Affix the session .Rscalade file to use via options()

.check_rscalade()

Mega helper to suss out the rscalade location

.not_alerted()

Helper to check for .Rscalade in project, user home, or specified

construct() burn()

Edit existing ladder definitions via construction and destruction

liveedit()

Edit existing ladder definitions interactively

transport()

Install & upgrade packages from ladders

climb()

Attaches packages specified by ladders

scalade_conflicts()

Conflicts between the scalade and other packages

scalade_logo_text()

The scalade logo, using ASCII or Unicode characters

scalade_packages()

List all packages in the scalade

scalade_prebuilt

A series of predefined ladders

setup()

Creating a fresh .Rscalade definition file

inspect()

View defined ladders in a pretty-printed manner
